mapper.insert: insert into db_postitemlog (SID, ITEMID, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, PRICETYPE, SITE, PRICE, SKU, FLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, OPERTYPE, ERROR, CONTENT) values (#{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pricetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{opertype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{error,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_postitemlog set ITEMID = #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOPID = #{shopid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOPNAME = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICETYPE = #{pricetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SITE = #{site,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SKU = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPERTYPE = #{opertype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ERROR = #{error,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SID, ITEMID, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, PRICETYPE, SITE, PRICE, SKU, FLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, OPERTYPE, ERROR, CONTENT from db_postitemlog where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SID, ITEMID, SHOPID, SHOPNAME, PRICETYPE, SITE, PRICE, SKU, FLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, OPERTYPE, ERROR, CONTENT from db_postitemlog
